description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任青岛市崂山区区长及区委书记、淄博市委书记、潍坊市委书记，后任重庆市人民政府副市长。2025年10月因涉嫌严重违纪违法被查。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as the district mayor and party secretary of Laoshan District in Qingdao, party secretary of Zibo, and party secretary of Weifang, before becoming the vice mayor of Chongqing Municipal People's Government. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law in October 2025.

description.zh-cn: 山东省下辖的县级市，江敦涛的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Shandong Province, birthplace of Jiang Duntao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党青岛市委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党青岛市委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the CPC Qingdao Municipal Committee

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党青岛市委员会的组织工作和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the CPC Qingdao Municipal Committee responsible for organizational work and personnel management.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在青岛市崂山区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Laoshan District, Qingdao.

description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Zibo.

description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Weifang.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Chongqing.

en: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Chinese Communist Party

description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Chinese Communist Party.

en: National Supervisory Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家监察机关。
description.en: The highest state supervisory agency of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的前任中共淄博市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's predecessor as the CPC Party Secretary of Zibo.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的继任中共淄博市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's successor as the CPC Party Secretary of Zibo.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的前任中共潍坊市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's predecessor as the CPC Party Secretary of Weifang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的继任中共潍坊市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's successor as the CPC Party Secretary of Weifang.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的前任中共青岛市崂山区委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's predecessor as the CPC Party Secretary of Laoshan District, Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的继任中共青岛市崂山区委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's successor as the CPC Party Secretary of Laoshan District, Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的前任青岛市崂山区人民政府区长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's predecessor as the Mayor of Laoshan District People's Government, Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，江敦涛的继任青岛市崂山区人民政府区长。
description.en: Chinese politician, Jiang Duntao's successor as the Mayor of Laoshan District People's Government, Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛出生于山东莱阳。
description.en: Jiang Duntao was born in Laiyang, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Jiang Duntao is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国共产党青岛市委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛曾任青岛市委组织部副部长。
description.en: Jiang Duntao once served as Deputy Director of the Organization Department of the CPC Qingdao Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 青岛市崂山区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 2015年4月至2017年1月，江敦涛任青岛市崂山区区长。
description.en: From April 2015 to January 2017, Jiang Duntao served as the District Mayor of Laoshan District, Qingdao.

relationships.target: 中国共产党青岛市崂山区委员会

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月至2019年8月，江敦涛任中共青岛市崂山区委书记。此前他还曾担任该委员会的副书记。
description.en: From January 2017 to August 2019, Jiang Duntao served as the Party Secretary of the CPC Laoshan District Committee, Qingdao. He had also previously served as the committee's deputy secretary.

relationships.target: 中国共产党淄博市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2019年8月至2022年7月，江敦涛任中共淄博市委书记。
description.en: From August 2019 to July 2022, Jiang Duntao served as the Party Secretary of the CPC Zibo Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党潍坊市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年7月至2023年1月，江敦涛任中共潍坊市委书记。
description.en: From July 2022 to January 2023, Jiang Duntao served as the Party Secretary of the CPC Weifang Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 潍坊市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年12月，江敦涛兼任潍坊市人大常委会主任。
description.en: In December 2022, Jiang Duntao also assumed the post of Director of the Standing Committee of the Weifang Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2023年1月，江敦涛当选重庆市副市长，直至2025年10月落马。
description.en: In January 2023, Jiang Duntao was elected as Vice Mayor of Chongqing, a position he held until his downfall in October 2025.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2025年10月25日，因涉嫌严重违纪违法，江敦涛接受中央纪委国家监委纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: On October 25, 2025, Jiang Duntao was subjected to disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国家监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 2025年10月25日，因涉嫌严重违纪违法，江敦涛接受中央纪委国家监委纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: On October 25, 2025, Jiang Duntao was subjected to disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛接替杨鹏鸣出任青岛市崂山区人民政府区长。
description.en: Jiang Duntao succeeded Yang Pengming as the District Mayor of the People's Government of Laoshan District, Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 赵燕接替江敦涛出任青岛市崂山区人民政府区长。
description.en: Zhao Yan succeeded Jiang Duntao as the District Mayor of the People's Government of Laoshan District, Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛接替齐家滨出任中共青岛市崂山区委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Duntao succeeded Qi Jiabin as the Party Secretary of the CPC Qingdao Laoshan District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 孙海生接替江敦涛出任中共青岛市崂山区委员会书记。
description.en: Sun Haisheng succeeded Jiang Duntao as the Party Secretary of the CPC Qingdao Laoshan District Committee.

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛接替周连华出任中共淄博市委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Duntao succeeded Zhou Lianhua as the Party Secretary of the CPC Zibo Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 马晓磊接替江敦涛出任中共淄博市委员会书记。
description.en: Ma Xiaolei succeeded Jiang Duntao as the Party Secretary of the CPC Zibo Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 江敦涛接替田庆盈出任中共潍坊市委员会书记。
description.en: Jiang Duntao succeeded Tian Qingying as the Party Secretary of the CPC Weifang Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘运接替江敦涛出任中共潍坊市委员会书记。
description.en: Liu Yun succeeded Jiang Duntao as the Party Secretary of the CPC Weifang Municipal Committee.
